channel.title: Hello World
channel.itunes:summary: Hello World is a 30 minutes daily show on LearnTV. Hello World is made up of special guests, content challenges, upcoming events, and daily updates from Microsoft related news. Come for a specific segment, please stay for the energy. Hello World is meant to be fun and educational to the viewing audience who are interested in Microsoft products and Microsoft current events. Visualize this show like your national morning talk show. A regular cast of hosts, who then work on with others to build and deliver short and concise 2-5 minute segments of interest. Watch it live on LearnTV Add the Hello World show schedule to your calendar with this Invite - https://aka.ms/helloworld/reminder.
channel.googleplay:author: Microsoft Developer Relations
channel.itunes:author: Microsoft Developer Relations

Visualize this show like your national morning talk show. A regular cast of hosts, who then work on with others to build and deliver short and concise 2-5 minute segments of interest. Watch it live on LearnTV Add the Hello World show schedule to your calendar with this Invite - https://aka.ms/helloworld/reminder.

item.description:

item.title: Hello World: Friday, March 12, 2021
item.description:
Join the conversation live at https://aka.ms/learnTV  ‚Äã ‚Äã

üëâ Want to influence future Hello World broadcasts? Take 30 seconds to share your feedback with us here: https://aka.ms/HelloWorldFeedback 
 
Welcome & Agenda
 
MVP Spotlight
  • Learn more about MVP Adam Wisniewski: https://www.linkedin.com/in/adamwiz/ 
  • Adam's Distant Together AI Software: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yXx_QuCQYVE&t=34s 
  • To learn more about Adam Wisniewski's 3D Hologram of Martin Luther King's "I have a Dream" speech, please visit: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nqAQNPG2jdI 
24 Hz
  • See Shuji Nakamura, the 2014 Nobel Prize winner in Physics, discuss the Blue LED https://youtu.be/fUlR9DP6Me4 
Student Ambassador
  • Learn more about how students are changing the world the Microsoft Imagine Cup at https://imaginecup.microsoft.com 
 

iCal URL https://aka.ms/helloworld/reminder

item.title: Hello World: Thursday, March 11, 2021
item.description:
In this episode, Frank is welcoming a new co-host Nitya Narasimhan. We will learn some Azure Tips and Tricks for Java. Meet the inspiring Tasha and Tala, sharing more about their journey, and finally we will learn why should we want to be certified with Thomas Maurer

Join the conversation live at https://aka.ms/learnTV ‚Äã ‚Äã

üëâ Want to influence future Hello World broadcasts? Take 30 seconds to share your feedback with us here: https://aka.ms/HelloWorldFeedback

Welcome & Agenda
- Learn It Challenge
- PyTorch
 
Azure Tips and Tricks
- Check out all the Azure Tips and Tricks available at https://aka.ms/azuretipsandtricks
 
Humans of Microsoft
- You can connect with Tasha at @TashasEv on Twitter!
 
Certifications @ Microsoft
- Need another reason to earn a Microsoft Certification? 
- Learn It Challenge
 
File New Project
- Meet Tala Buwadi on her website https://tbuwadi.com/
 
iCal URL https://aka.ms/helloworld/reminder
 
Episode Segments
[00:00] Countdown
[00:22] Welcome & Agenda
[04:40] Azure Tips and Tricks
[10:23] Humans of Microsoft
[15:46] Certifications @ Microsoft
[20:11] File New Project
[25:56] Coming-up Next

item.title: Hello World: Wednesday, March 10, 2021
item.description:
In this episode Amy and Dean covered their favorite parts of MS Ignite and how Bethesda have joined Team XBox. Jeremiah shared the audiences stories around usage of Active Directory. Jay shared the topic of his Azure Fun Bytes show on Thursday 11 March - machine learning. Kayla Cinnamon, Program Manager on the Windows Terminal team demoed the new features in Windows Terminal Preview 1.7 and we wrapped up with Shiva telling us all about why we should sign up for Microsoft Include on 17 March

Join the conversation live at https://aka.ms/learnTV‚Äã ‚Äã

üëâ Want to influence future Hello World broadcasts? Take 30 seconds to share your feedback with us here: https://aka.ms/HelloWorldFeedback
 
Intro and agenda
  • Find Microsoft Ignite on-demand https://docs.microsoft.com/events
  • Bethesda joins Team Xbox - Phil Spencer Tweet and Blog
 
Audience Challenge Review
  • Active Directory/AAD: https://aka.ms/HelloWorldChallengeWeek3
 
AzureFunBytes
  • Check out @AzureFunBytes with @jaydestro every Thursday at 11 AM / 2 PM EST on @LearnTV https://aka.ms/LearnTV‚Äã 
 
WinDevBox
  • Windows Terminal
  • Stable: https://aka.ms/terminal‚Äã  
  • Preview: https://aka.ms/terminal-preview‚Äã
  • Docs: https://aka.ms/terminal-docs‚Äã 
  • GitHub: https://github.com/microsoft/terminal‚Äã 
 
Include
  • Learn more about diversity & inclusion (D&I) https://aka.ms/msinclude
 
Episode's Segments
 
[00:00] Countdown
[01:10] Welcome & Headlines
[04:49] ‚ÄãAudience Challenge Review
[11:09] Azure Fun Bytes
[16:16] WinDevBox
[21:17] Include
[26:44] Wrap-up
 
 
iCal URL
  • https://aka.ms/helloworld/reminder

item.title: Hello World: Tuesday, March 9, 2021
item.description:
We are welcoming a new host Suzanne, who is joining us from Singapore. In this episode we are talking about Multipass a OSS project, Active Directory, #TokCode, and for the first time This week on Channel 9! A big episode let us know your favorite moment!

Join the conversation live at https://aka.ms/learnTV‚Äã ‚Äã

Intro and Agenda
  • You can register for Ignite China at https://aka.ms/ignitechina21
  • Watch Ignite video on demand one: https://docs.microsoft.com/events
 
SpotLight: OSS Project
  • Try Multipass. Visit https://aka.ms/hello-oss
 
This week on Channel 9 
  • Ignite Recap
  • ARM, ARC 
  • Power Fx
  • Power Automate Desktop free 
  • VS Code Update
  • Windows Terminal Preview 
  • Christina's Pick of the Week
Audience Challenge
  • "Because Active Directory can do almost *anything*, people use it for *everything*. What's the zaniest thing you've seen AD used for?"-- @jdooley_clt #HelloWorldChallenge
 
‚Äã#CodeTok
  • See all these videos and more at: aka.ms/codetok

Episode Segments

[00:00] Countdown
[00:06] Intro and Agenda
[04:06] SpotLight: OSS Project
[08:46] This week on Channel 9 
[14:55] Audience Challenge
[20:03] ‚Äã#CodeTok
[25:19] Coming-Up Next

item.title: Hello World: Monday, March 8, 2021
item.description:
Join the conversation live at https://aka.ms/learnTV‚Äã ‚Äã

In this episode we will learn if electricity is green, reveal the magic of virtual background in Teams and so much more!

Intro and Agenda

  • International Women's' Day
  • Microsoft DigiGirlz
Teams Tips & Tricks

Microsoft Teams virtual backgrounds

  • Microsoft Teams virtual backgrounds: Microsoft Teams virtual backgrounds - Microsoft Educator Center
Microsoft Green
  • Find out more about electricity and green software engineering in our learn module, https://aka.ms/sse/learn

Learn Live

  • Watch Learn Live at https://aka.ms/LearnLiveNow
  • Learn more about the new: Exam SC-900: Microsoft Security, Compliance, and Identity Fundamentals

item.title: Hello World: Friday, March 5, 2021
item.description:
Join the conversation live at https://aka.ms/learnTV ‚Äã ‚Äã 
 
Intro and Agenda

  • Power-Fx
 
MVP/RD Spotlight

  • Learn more about Richard Campbell: https://rd.microsoft.com/en-us/richard-campbell 
  • Listen to .NET Rocks: https://www.dotnetrocks.com 
  • Get involved with Humanitarian Toolbox: http://www.htbox.org & https://github.com/htbox 
 

24

item.itunes:author: Frank Boucher

item.title: Hello World: Thursday, 4 March 2021
item.description:
After two days of Ignite, it feels good to be back. In today's show we will meet some very inspiring people, learn new Azure tips and tricks, and of course review some Ignite news such as certifications.

Intro and Agenda

  • Book of news
  • Power Automate Desktop

 

File New Project

  • Meet Adesola on Twitter @eyilanke

 

Azure Tips and Tricks

  • Be sure to check out all the @azure #tips and #tricks at http://aka.ms/azuretipsandtricks

 

Humans of Microsoft

  • Connect with LaBrina on Twitter @chixcancode !

 

Certifications @ Microsoft

  • Microsoft.com/Learn: https://Microsoft.com/Learn
  • Exciting learning news and opportunities at Microsoft Ignite, March 2-4: https://aka.ms/LearnIgniteAnnouncements_Mar2021

 

Coming Up Next

  • International Women's Day Challenge: https://livecoders.dev/conference
  • Watch: What's New in Visual Studio 2019
  • Share it us your picture/ art/ DYI of Clippy! using the #HelloWorldLive

 

Episode's Segments

[00:00] Countdown
[01:08] Intro and Agenda
[03:33] File New Project
[08:56] Azure Tips and Tricks
[13:55] Humans of Microsoft
[19:19] Certifications @ Microsoft
[26:16] Coming Up Next

item.dc:creator: Frank Boucher, Anthony Bartolo, Jason Hand
item.itunes:author: Frank Boucher, Anthony Bartolo, Jason Hand

item.title: Hello World: Friday, Feb 26, 2021
item.description:
It's been an amazing first week of Hello World!

And the last episode of the first week (Friday, February 26, 2021) was action packed! We found out the scoop on Learn Live at Microsoft Ignite. Met an incredible MVP, Mary Thompson who is running a tech hub for disadvantaged women, found out why blue LEDs are the most important human invention ever, and were inspired by Diego's wall.
 
Thanks for joining us and we hope to see you next week!
 
Welcome & Headlines
  • Microsoft Ignite
 
Spotlight: MVP/RD Community
  • Find out more about the Microsoft MVP Award Program and Regional Director Program 
  • Find out more about Mary's Tech Hub for Women 
  • Signup for the App in a Day workshop. aka.ms/AIADEvent  
 
24 Hz
  • To learn more about Autonomous Systems, visit https://innovation.microsoft.com/en-us/autonomous-systems 
 
File New Project
  • Reach out to Nicson Martinez on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/nicsonm 
 
Diego's Wall
  • Great book: The School of Life: An Emotional Education

 

Episode Segments

[00:00]‚Äã Countdown
[01:09]‚Äã Welcome & Headlines
[06:59] Spotlight: MVP/RD Community
[13:05] ‚Äã24 Hz
[19:15]‚Äã File New Project
[25:04]‚Äã Diego's Wall
[29:36] Wrap-up  

 

 ~ Originally air on LearnTV now archived on Ch9

 

‚òÅÔ∏è

item.dc:creator: Frank Boucher
item.itunes:author: Frank Boucher

item.title: Hello World! Wednesday Feb, 24
item.description:
On todays episode of HelloWorld we heard all about what's in store for .NET Conf tomorrow (Thursday 23rd February 2021), we reviewed your amazing submissions for the audience challenge: What's the most ridiculous firewall exception you've ever had to put in place, and why? Had a sneak peek into the next AzureFunBytes episode with Jay Gordon, and wrapped up with Kayla and Demitrius sharing what winget can do! Thanks for joining us and we hope to see you tomorrow.

Show Notes

Welcome & Headlines

  • Microsoft Ignite
  • Microsoft Include 2021
  • Azure Firewall Premium

.NET Conf

  • .Net Conf

Audience Challenge Review

  • Azure Firewall Premium now in preview
  • Azure Firewall documentation
  • Introduction to Azure Firewall

Tips & Tricks AzureFunBytes

  • Learn more about Azure Cosmos DB
  • Check out @AzureFunBytes with @jaydestro every Thursday at 11 AM / 2 PM EST on @LearnTV aka.ms/LearnTV

WinDevBox

  • Install winget as your new package manager

 

 Episode Segments

[00:00]‚Äã Countdown
[00:20]‚Äã Welcome & Headlines
[05:08]‚Äã .NET Conf
[10:34] ‚ÄãAudience Challenge Review
[15:38]‚Äã Tips & Tricks AzureFunBytes
[21:02]‚Äã WinDevBox
[25:39] Wrap-up

 

 ~ Originally air on LearnTV now archived on Ch9

 

‚òÅÔ∏è
item.itunes:summary: On todays episode of HelloWorld we heard all about what's in store for .NET Conf tomorrow (Thursday 23rd February 2021), we reviewed your amazing submissions for the audience challenge: What's the most ridiculous firewall exception you've ever had to put in place, and why? Had a sneak peek into the next AzureFunBytes episode with Jay Gordon, and wrapped up with Kayla and Demitrius sharing what winget can do! Thanks for joining us and we hope to see you tomorrow. Show NotesWelcome & HeadlinesMicrosoft IgniteMicrosoft Include 2021Azure Firewall Premium.NET Conf.Net ConfAudience Challenge ReviewAzure Firewall Premium now in previewAzure Firewall documentationIntroduction to Azure FirewallTips & Tricks AzureFunBytesLearn more about Azure Cosmos DBCheck out @AzureFunBytes with @jaydestro every Thursday at 11 AM / 2 PM EST on @LearnTV aka.ms/LearnTVWinDevBoxInstall winget as your new package manager Episode Segments [00:00]‚Äã Countdown[00:20]‚Äã Welcome & Headlines[05:08]‚Äã .NET Conf[10:34] ‚ÄãAudience Challenge Review[15:38]‚Äã Tips & Tricks AzureFunBytes[21:02]‚Äã WinDevBox[25:39] Wrap-up ~ Originally air on LearnTV now archived on Ch9 ‚òÅÔ∏è

item.title: Hello World! Tuesday Feb, 23
item.description:
On todays episode of HelloWorld we heard more about what's happening in the DAPR space, we ventured into the world of #CodeTok on TikTok an wrapped up with a challenge for you to take part in, What's the most ridiculous firewall exception you've ever had to put in place, and why?

Thanks for joining us and we hope to see you tomorrow.

Show Notes

Welcome & Headlines

  • Microsoft Ignite
  • .NET Conf: https://focus.dotnetconf.net
  • Enabling responsible AI development with new open source capabilities: https://aka.ms/rai/oss

OSS Spotlight

  • See it all Dapr and Nitya's sketch note: https://aka.ms/hello-dapr

#CodeTok Talk

  • Follow along and find out more at: https://aka.ms/codetok

Audience Challenge

  • Share with us on Twitter: üëâ What's the most ridiculous firewall exception you've ever had to put in place, and why? #HelloWorldChallenge

  

Episode Segments

[00:00]‚Äã Countdown
[00:58]‚Äã Welcome & Headlines
[06:46]‚Äã SpotLight: OSS Project
[13:01] ‚Äã#CodeTok
[18:49]‚Äã Audience Challenge
[25:35] Wrap-up

 

 ~ Originally air on LearnTV now archived on Ch9

item.title: Hello World! Monday Feb, 22
item.description:
From Teams Tips & Tricks to Microsoft Green without forgetting a mysterious wall of wisdom... That first episode of Hello World is a must.

Show Notes

Welcome & Headlines

  • Microsoft Ignite

Teams Tips & Tricks

  • Manage notifications in Teams: aka.ms/notifications-teams

Microsoft Green

  • Learn Module: The Principles of Sustainable Software Engineering
  • Learn more: aka.ms/gts/carbon-commitment

Learn Live

  • Learn Live Show

[04:46] Welcome & Headlines
